thread.section_title: Hotel Beacon - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A second visit
thread.title_full: A second visit - Review of Hotel Beacon, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Beachboy2093
title: A second visit
text:
Stayed for 5 nights in early march 2017 on our second visit. Just as good as the first. Location is perfect on 75th street upper west side. Great market located opposite and rooms have a small Kitchener
Staff are very helpful and rooms are clean and comfortable. Bathrooms small but functional
A great place to stay
